name: DreadMaze
description:
Drop into an odd world, and explore the maze of broken fates.

Explore

Explore the maze for your escape, with odd landmarks and drawings madly scribbled on the walls. Remember your steps, for It always follows.

Find

Items are scattered throughout the maze, that can help you on your escape. Take caution however, these items are not easy to collect.

Run

It always follows, no matter where you go. Use your turns wisely.
